thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's R Systems International Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's R Systems International Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls

organizations.name: r systems international dec qtr consol profit falls feb

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - R Systems International Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 81.2 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 186 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 1.56 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.53 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* APPROVES RE-APPOINTMENT OF BALDEV SINGH AS PRESIDENT Source text - bit.ly/2BS4Fzs Further company coverage:
